Video Caption: Yuna Kim - Free Skate - Ladies' Figure Skating | Vancouver 2010
Comment: I miss Queen Yuna. And I was touched by what she said about Russian doping for figure skaters around the world.She was a great person who lost her gold medal to a Russian player but didn't complain a word. It's so cool that she speaks out for her juniors.

Video Caption: Yuna Kim - Free Skate - Ladies' Figure Skating | Vancouver 2010
Comment: 1:35 어떻게 저렇게 멀리 높게 뛰고 안정적으로 우아하게 착지할 수있지...요즘 피겨는 우아함은 전혀없고 기이하고 신기해서 보게되는 서커스같음. 2014년때처럼 러시아는 꼭! 이번 올림픽에서도 반드시 금메달을 따길바람. 수치스러운 금메달은 전혀 의미가없으니까. 차라리 일본과의 라이벌 구도일때가 그립다. 러시아 서커스좀 그만보고싶네

Video Caption: Yuna Kim - Free Skate - Ladies' Figure Skating | Vancouver 2010
Comment: Now skating is dominated by quads, I miss the solid musicality AND technical ability. Her jumps are TEXTBOOK. Kim Yuna will always be the GOAT.
